about_the_game:
Royal rodents,

Need a break from the daily grind of Frog slaughter? Put your paws up and enjoy a nice glass of chilled bug juice with the official Tails of Iron soundtrack. Composed by the royally-recognised Francesco Ameglio, these sixteen tracks will take you on a journey across Rat Kingdom without having to leave the comfy confines of Crimson Keep.

Soothe your soul to the medieval strings of your fellow Rats. Claw-pump your way through the rhythmic war drums of the Frog army. ‘Robot’ like no one’s looking with the synth-supremacy of the Neo-futuristic mole-musik. All this and more awaits in this Bohemian Ratsody for the ages. Your soundtrack begins, my liege…
